Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piparyenoc ettoub/out: peniwt abba Iwann/c <ame: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O pure virgin, our father Abba John Kame, that He may forgive us our sins.
